17-community.title: 17 community
17-community.subtitle: Working together to build a better future for everyone.

stop-poverty.title: Stop poverty
stop-poverty.subtitle: End poverty in all its forms everywhere.

zero-hunger.title: Zero hunger
zero-hunger.subtitle: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture.

good-health.title: Good health
good-health.subtitle: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages.

quality-education.title: Quality education
quality-education.subtitle: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all.

gender-equality.title: Gender equality
gender-equality.subtitle: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls.

clean-water.title: Clean water
clean-water.subtitle: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all.

affordable-energy.title: Affordable energy
affordable-energy.subtitle: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all.

economic-growth.title: Economic growth
economic-growth.subtitle: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all.

industry-innovation.title: Industry innovation
industry-innovation.subtitle: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation.

reduced-inequalities.title: Reduced inequalities
reduced-inequalities.subtitle: Reduce inequality within and among countries.

sustainable-communities.title: Sustainable communities
sustainable-communities.subtitle: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable.

responsible-consumtion.title: Responsible consumption
responsible-consumtion.subtitle: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns.

climate-action.title: Climate action
climate-action.subtitle: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts.

life-below-water.title: Life below water
life-below-water.subtitle: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development.

life-on-land.title: Life on land
life-on-land.subtitle: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of ecosystems.

peace.title: Peace
peace.subtitle: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels.

partnerships.title: Partnerships
partnerships.subtitle: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the global partnership for sustainable development.
